specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @2.0GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM V5) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 2x SATA II, 2x eSATA 2.0 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Type A), 2x USB 3.0 (Type A) *Power: 12V/5A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:QNAP TS-221 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:QNAP TS-221 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:QNAP TS-221 SATA Board
